name: srtm_elevation_500m
title: Physical Elevation
description: Global elevation (in meters) from Shuttle Radar Topography Mission (SRTM) dataset (v4.1) at 500m resolution.
details: No additional processing of raw data.

extract_types_info.mean: average elevation within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.max: maximum elevation within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.min: minimum elevation within each unit of analysis
extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis

extras.citation: Jarvis A., H.I. Reuter, A. Nelson, E. Guevara, 2008, Hole-filled seamless SRTM data V4, International Centre for Tropical Agriculture (CIAT), available from http://srtm.csi.cgiar.org.
